dcterms:creator: B. Li

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset with five main background scenes: city, field, highlight, ocean, and cloud. Approximately 37% of the images contain no less than 2 objects, and approximately 32% of the objects are located outside the top 10% of the image brightness values.
dcterms:title: NUDT-SIRST

dcterms:creator: Y. Dai
Y. Wu
F. Zhou
K. Barnard
dcterms:description: A real dataset consisting of 427 infrared images from different scenes. Approximately 10% of the images in this dataset contain multiple objects.
dcterms:title: SIRST

dcterms:creator: M. Zhang
Y. Wu

dcterms:description: A real dataset consisting of 1000 infrared images of 512Ã—512 pixels, containing small targets of different types and locations, such as drones, creatures, ships, and vehicles, covering a variety of scenes.
dcterms:title: IRSTD-1K
